trade_volume.title: API Trade Volume Analysis
trade_volume.description: Semaglutide API trade volumes accelerated in Q3 2024, with China showing outsized growth driven by expanded peptide manufacturing capacity.

price_trend.title: API Price Trend (USD / gram)
price_trend.description: Declining API prices reflect improving supply depth and competitive pressure among peptide manufacturers.

import_dependency.title: Import Dependency & Sourcing Risk
import_dependency.description: High import reliance, particularly in India, elevates supply-chain risk and reinforces the strategic importance of supplier diversification.
